name.english: Al-Baqarah (The Cow) - Story of Adam and Children of Israel

stages.name: Verse 30
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا أَتَجْعَلُ فِيهَا مَن يُفْسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسْفِكُ الدِّمَاءَ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
stages.english: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, 'Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority.' They said, 'Will You place upon it one who causes corruption therein and sheds blood, while we declare Your praise and sanctify You?' Allah said, 'Indeed, I know that which you do not know'
stages.transliteration: Wa iz qaala rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee jaa'ilun fil ardi khaleefah; qaalooo ataj'alu feehaa mai yufsidu feehaa wa yasfikud dimaaa'a wa nahnu nusabbihu bihamdika wa nuqaddisu laka qaala inneee a'lamu maa laa ta'lamoon
stages.instruction: Learn about the creation of Adam and the angels' reaction

stages.name: Verse 31
stages.arabic: وَعَلَّمَ آدَمَ الْأَسْمَاءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمْ عَلَى الْمَلَائِكَةِ فَقَالَ أَنبِئُونِي بِأَسْمَاءِ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
stages.english: And He taught Adam the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels and said, 'Inform Me of the names of these, if you are truthful'
stages.transliteration: Wa 'allama Aaadamal asmaaa'a kullahaa summa 'aradahum 'alal malaaa'ikati faqaala ambi'oonee bi asmaaa'i haaa'ulaaa'i in kuntum saadiqeen
stages.instruction: Understand how Allah honored Adam with knowledge

stages.name: Verse 32
stages.arabic: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَا إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْعَلِيمُ الْحَكِيمُ
stages.english: They said, 'Exalted are You; we have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed, it is You who is the Knowing, the Wise'
stages.transliteration: Qaaloo subhaanaka laa 'ilma lanaaa illaa maa 'allamtanaa; innaka antal'Aleemul Hakeem
stages.instruction: Learn about the angels' humility before Allah

stages.name: Verse 33
stages.arabic: قَالَ يَا آدَمُ أَنبِئْهُم بِأَسْمَائِهِمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا أَنبَأَهُم بِأَسْمَائِهِمْ قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ إِنِّي أَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَأَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُونَ وَمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْتُمُونَ
stages.english: He said, 'O Adam, inform them of their names.' And when he had informed them of their names, He said, 'Did I not tell you that I know the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed'
stages.transliteration: Qaala yaaa Aadamu ambi'hum bi asmaaa'ihim falammaa amba ahum bi asmaaa'ihim qaala alam aqul lakum inneee a'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal ardi wa a'lamu maa tubdoona wa maa kuntum taktumoon

stages.name: Verse 34
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ اسْجُدُوا لِآدَمَ فَسَجَدُوا إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
stages.english: And [mention] when We said to the angels, 'Prostrate before Adam'; so they prostrated, except for Iblis. He refused and was arrogant and became of the disbelievers
stages.transliteration: Wa iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Iblees; abaa wastakbara wa kaana minal kaafireen
stages.instruction: Learn about Iblis's disobedience and pride

stages.name: Verse 35
stages.arabic: وَقُلْنَا يَا آدَمُ اسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
stages.english: And We said, 'O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat therefrom in [ease and] abundance from wherever you will. But do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers'
stages.transliteration: Wa qulnaa yaaa Aadamus kun anta wa zawjukal jannata wa kulaa minhaa raghadan haisu shi'tumaa wa laa taqrabaa haazihish shajarata fatakoonaa minaz zaalimeen
stages.instruction: Understand the test given to Adam and Eve

stages.name: Verse 36
stages.arabic: فَأَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطَانُ عَنْهَا فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَمَتَاعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
stages.english: But Satan caused them to slip out of it and removed them from that [condition] in which they had been. And We said, 'Go down, [all of you], as enemies to one another, and you will have upon the earth a place of settlement and provision for a time'
stages.transliteration: Fa azallahumash Shaitaanu 'anhaa fa akhrajahumaa mimmaa kaanaa feehi wa qulnah bitoo ba'dukum liba'din 'aduwwunw wa lakum fil ardi mustaqarrunw wa mataa'un ilaa heen
stages.instruction: Learn about the consequence of disobedience

stages.name: Verse 37
stages.arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰ آدَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِ كَلِمَاتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
stages.english: Then Adam received from his Lord [some] words, and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, it is He who is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful
stages.transliteration: Fatalaqqaaa Aadamu mir Rabbihee kalimaatin fataaba 'alaih; innahoo Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem
stages.instruction: Understand the mercy of Allah in accepting repentance

stages.name: Verse 38
stages.arabic: قُلْنَا اهْبِطُوا مِنْهَا جَمِيعًا ۖ فَإِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدًى فَمَن تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
stages.english: We said, 'Go down from it, all of you. And when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve'
stages.transliteration: Qulnah bitoo minhaa jamee'an fa immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan faman tabi'a hudaaya falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa laa hum yahzanoon
stages.instruction: Learn about divine guidance and its benefits

stages.name: Verse 39
stages.arabic: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ
stages.english: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
stages.transliteration: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaaa ulaaa'ika As haabun Naar; hum feehaa khaalidoon
stages.instruction: Understand the consequence of rejecting guidance

stages.name: Verse 40
stages.arabic: يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأَوْفُوا بِعَهْدِي أُوفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْ وَإِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُونِ
stages.english: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I bestowed upon you and fulfill My covenant [upon you] that I will fulfill your covenant [from Me], and be afraid of only Me
stages.transliteration: Yaa Baneee Israaa'eelaz kuroo ni'matiyal lateee an'amtu 'alaikum wa awfoo bi'ahdeee oofi bi'ahdikum wa iyyaaya farhaboon
stages.instruction: Understand Allah's covenant with the Children of Israel
